contents.text: Welcome to Twilio, the leading voice, SMS, and video platform connecting businesses globally.
For Sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To open a new Twilio account, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our new accounts team.

navigationGoals: Set up a new Twilio account.
I want to open a Twilio account to send SMS alerts for my veteran outreach program
I want to provision a new Twilio account and retrieve my Account SID and Auth Token.
I need help opening a new Twilio account.
I’d like to create a new Twilio account to experiment with SMS APIs for my physics lab.

contents.text: For pricing and product information, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing specialists.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing information on Twilio’s messaging and voice services.
I need detailed pricing info for Twilio SMS services for my nonprofit veteran charity
I need a detailed breakdown of usage-based pricing for SMS, Voice, and Video SDKs.
I’d like to know about Twilio pricing and service plans.
Could you provide me with the pricing breakdown for Twilio’s messaging and voice services for a student project?

contents.text: For Support, including technical and billing assistance, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with my Twilio integration.
I'm experiencing technical errors with my SMS API integration for my veteran support app
I'm encountering HTTP 400 errors with my Twilio API integration and need help debugging.
I’m having trouble with my Twilio setup and need technical help.
I’m experiencing issues sending messages via the Twilio API in my data collection script and need troubleshooting assistance.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my Twilio invoice.
I have a question about my billing statement for Twilio services used by my veteran group
I need an itemized breakdown of unexpected charges on my latest Twilio invoice.
I need assistance with a billing question on my Twilio account.
I need clarification on a recent billing charge for my Twilio usage this month.
